messages.subject: RE: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Doujinshi Annoucement - Blackpoint
messages.msgSnippet: Hm, you know what I just realized? I ve already read this doujinshi online. Looky: http://siusiak.nie.com.pl/~minak666/doujinshi.htm It s got the same title,
messages.messageBody:
Hm, you know what I just realized? I've already read this doujinshi online.
Looky:
http://siusiak.nie.com.pl/~minak666/doujinshi.htm
It's got the same title, and the same plot as described in that other site.
Though I'm not entirely sure if it's the same thing since the cover arts are
different. Maybe it's a sequel, since I remember seeing the webmistress of
Bishounen Sanctuary talk about a sequel to Black Point.
*shrugs*


Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."

-----------------

Yup it's definitely in English. Actually I think they re-arranged
their site, which is really a disadvantage to us since now I don't
see the sample pages or the online doujinshi that they used to do.

Hmm... From what Spiritus_Saitou said it's now for June? Hmm... The
pushed it back? In the e-mail they sent me it was May. Well either
way if you want to see a couple of sample pages (non-explicit,
frankly a little bland - probably because they didn't know if I was
18+) e-mail me and I will forward their e-mail to me.

I love doujinshi... I'm sure this is old news but for those who do
not know and is interested in Japanese doujinshi's go to
aestheticism.com, doujinshiplanet.com and dojindomei.com. They have
both yaoi and non-yaoi.


--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan
<bsher213@b...> wrote:
> Whoa! That looks like some "interesting" stuff. I didn't check out
the
> link tot he publisher yet but I am safe in assuming this is an
English
> language thing?
>
> Personally I'm quite intrigued by that cover art as it's sort of
keeping
> in line with my current fanfic on ff.net that takes a really
different
> look at the Saiitou/Sano thing. I think I'd title the
picture "Tokio's
> Revenge"
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Doujinshi Annoucement - Blackpoint
messages.msgSnippet: Awesome. Thanks for sharing. I love the SAISA pairing. ^-^ Oddly enough though, I never knew this site existed, despite of my fanatic searching on the net.
messages.messageBody:
Awesome. Thanks for sharing.
I love the SAISA pairing. ^-^
Oddly enough though, I never knew this site existed, despite of my fanatic
searching on the net. Hmm...But I'm super giddy you shared this link with
moi. Thankya!

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."

----------------------

The release of a new doujinshi has been announced on an RK yaoi
list. The cover's theme is adult in nature, so don't go there if
you're squeamish. ;-)

phil

>>It's Saito and Sano - and its coming in June!

http://www.studioplugnplay.com/ebaycover.jpg

Thanks.

Studio Plug'n Play
http:www.studioplugnplay.com
English Language Doujinshi Circle
<<

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Doujinshi Annoucement - Blackpoint
messages.msgSnippet: Whoa! That looks like some interesting stuff.  I didn t check out the link tot he publisher yet but I am safe in assuming this is an English language thing?
messages.messageBody:
Whoa! That looks like some "interesting" stuff. I didn't check out the
link tot he publisher yet but I am safe in assuming this is an English
language thing?

Personally I'm quite intrigued by that cover art as it's sort of keeping
in line with my current fanfic on ff.net that takes a really different
look at the Saiitou/Sano thing. I think I'd title the picture "Tokio's
Revenge"

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
